name: BEPRO Network
intro: Web3 codebase protocol for EVM Development
introduce: Bepro Network is a Code-as-a-Service protocol that connects developers with operators or anyone looking to build open-source development repositories. BEPRO Network aims to create an ecosystem of tools and resources for developers and companies that want to build decentralized applications, in a fast and secure way. At Bepro Network, developers and promoters will be able to work, collaborate and contribute to open-source projects.
